subject: Order
description_text:
I recently ordered from simsonn a pedal set and a shifter. My pedals are going to be delivered today but still haven’t seen the shifter ship yet or heard anything about it. I would like to get a refund for the shifter. Thanks
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Damon Johnston,  Please provide your order number, and we will check whether the shipment has been delayed due to stock availability.

I asked for a refund why would it have been sent out after I asked for my money back? I don’t want it I want my money back like I asked 3 days ago 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Damon Johnston,    Sorry I didn't receive your message in time. Your order has already been shipped and cannot be canceled. My apologies.
Hi Damon Johnston,    Sorry for not updating you promptly about the shipment. Your package was actually dispatched on the 6th.

I messaged 3 days ago about getting my refund and you guys asked for order number then it shipped right after. You’ll be getting it back 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Damon Johnston,    We only accept cancellations made within 24 hours. Thank you for your understanding.

I don’t think this would have been a problem if it was shipped out with my previous order placed on the same day. 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Damon Johnston,    We sincerely apologize for the delay. This new product is currently out of stock due to insufficient inventory. Thank you for your understanding. We will compensate you for this inconvenience.

Thank you very much I appreciate that. 
Sent from my iPhone

>

When is the compensation going to be sent over?
Sent from my iPhone

>
